name: Little Planet VR
description:
Download: https://discord.gg/AvDsbxJQvs 
Welcome to Little Planet! With the roar of the spaceship, you landed at a lovely planet—— You can escape into a fantasy, ever-growing and a whole new life. Explore and decorate your own little planet, which is full of excitement, fun items, creatures, and scenery.

Missions? Rather some reminders:

  • The backpack fills up quickly? You need to learn to manage your inventory strategically.
  • Complete terrain editing independently, making a maze is also a great choice!
  • Find a way to get gifts floating in the air.
  • Pay off your debts! Otherwise, you will be sent back to Earth! (Just kidding :) )
  • Fishing? Try to master casting the rod first.
  • Build your beautiful garden from scratch!
  • Look for scattered easter eggs.
  • Never drop items by the sea or else...
  • Make a room that is more aesthetic than the sample room.
  • Be kind to everyone, whether it's a player or an NPC (No animal cruelty!) etc...

Not available here: hustle and bustle,tedious, academic pressure, tests, cat's paw, endless competition. It's your show time to demonstrate your extraordinary wisdom, aesthetics planning ability, strategic thinking and a beautiful mind looking forward to a better life.
